verses.verse: Set the trumpet<WH7782> to<WH413> thy mouth.<WH2441> He shall come as an eagle<WH5404> against<WH5921> the house<WH1004> of the LORD,<WH3068> because<WH3282> they have transgressed<WH5674> my covenant,<WH1285> and trespassed<WH6586> against<WH5921> my law.<WH8451>
Israel <WH3478> shall cry<WH2199> unto me, My God,<WH430> we know<WH3045> thee.
Israel <WH3478> hath cast off<WH2186> the thing that is good:<WH2896> the enemy<WH341> shall pursue<WH7291> him.

They <WH1992> have set up kings,<WH4427> but not<WH3808> by<WH4480> me: they have made princes,<WH8323> and I knew<WH3045> it not:<WH3808> of their silver<WH3701> and their gold<WH2091> have they made<WH6213> them idols,<WH6091> that<WH4616> they may be cut off.<WH3772>

For <WH3588> they<WH1992> are gone up<WH5927> to Assyria,<WH804> a wild ass<WH6501> alone<WH909> by himself: Ephraim<WH669> hath hired<WH8566> lovers.<WH158>

Because <WH3588> Ephraim<WH669> hath made many<WH7235> altars<WH4196> to sin,<WH2398> altars<WH4196> shall be<WH1961> unto him to sin.<WH2398>
I have written<WH3789> to him the great things<WH7230> of my law,<WH8451> but they were counted<WH2803> as<WH3644> a strange thing.<WH2114>

They sacrifice<WH2076> flesh<WH1320> for the sacrifices<WH2077> of mine offerings,<WH1890> and eat<WH398> it; but the LORD<WH3068> accepteth<WH7521> them not;<WH3808> now<WH6258> will he remember<WH2142> their iniquity,<WH5771> and visit<WH6485> their sins:<WH2403> they<WH1992> shall return<WH7725> to Egypt.<WH4714>

For Israel<WH3478> hath forgotten<WH7911> <WH853> his Maker,<WH6213> and buildeth<WH1129> temples;<WH1964> and Judah<WH3063> hath multiplied<WH7235> fenced<WH1219> cities:<WH5892> but I will send<WH7971> a fire<WH784> upon his cities,<WH5892> and it shall devour<WH398> the palaces<WH759> thereof.
